2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.1: And David spoke to the Lord the words of this canticle, in the day that the Lord delivered him out of the hand of all his enemies, and out of the hand of Saul,
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.2: And he said: The Lord is my rock, and my strength, and my saviour.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.3: God is my strong one, in him will I trust: my shield, and the horn of my salvation: he lifteth me up, and is my refuge: my saviour, thou wilt deliver me from iniquity.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.4: I will call on the Lord who is worthy to be praised: and I shall be saved from my enemies.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.5: For the pangs of death have surrounded me: the floods of Belial have made me afraid.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.6: The cords of hell compassed me: the snares of death prevented me.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.7: In my distress I will call upon the Lord, and I will cry to my God: and he will hear my voice out of his temple, and my cry shall come to his ears.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.8: The earth shook and trembled, the foundations of the mountains were moved, and shaken, because he was angry with them.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.9: A smoke went up from his nostrils, and a devouring fire out of his mouth: coals were kindled by it.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.10: He bowed the heavens, and came down: and darkness was under his feet.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.11: And he rode upon the cherubims, and flew: and slid upon the wings of the wind.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.12: He made darkness a covering round about him: dropping waters out of the clouds of the heavens.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.13: By the brightness before him, the coals of fire were kindled.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.14: The Lord shall thunder from heaven: and the most high shall give forth his voice.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.15: He shot arrows and scattered them: lightning, and consumed them.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.16: And the overflowings of the sea appeared, and the foundations of the world were laid open at the rebuke of the Lord, at the blast of the spirit of his wrath.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.17: He sent from on high, and took me, and drew me out of many waters.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.18: He delivered me from my most mighty enemy, and from them that hated me: for they were too strong for me.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.19: He prevented me in the day of my affliction, and the Lord became my stay.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.20: And he brought me forth into a large place, he delivered me, because I pleased him.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.21: The Lord will reward me according to my justice: and according to the cleanness of my hands he will render to me.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.22: Because I have kept the ways of the Lord, and have not wickedly departed from my God.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.23: For all his judgments are in my sight: and his precepts I have not removed from me.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.24: And I shall be perfect with him: and shall keep myself from my iniquity.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.25: And the Lord will recompense me according to my justice: and according to the cleanness of my hands in the sight of his eyes.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.26: With the holy one thou wilt be holy: and with the valiant perfect.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.27: With the elect thou wilt be elect: and with the perverse thou wilt be perverted.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.28: And the poor people thou wilt save: and with thy eyes thou wilt humble the haughty.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.29: For thou art my lamp, O Lord: and thou, O Lord, wilt enlighten my darkness.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.30: For in thee I will run girded: in my God I will leap over the wall.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.31: God, his way is immaculate, the word of the Lord is tried by fire: he is the shield of all that trust in him.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.32: Who is God but the Lord: and who is strong but our God?
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.33: God who hath girded me with strength, and made my way perfect.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.34: Making my feet like the feet of harts, and setting me upon my high places.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.35: He teacheth my bands to war: and maketh my arms like a bow of brass.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.36: Thou hast given me the shield of my salvation: and thy mildness hath multiplied me.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.37: Thou shalt enlarge my steps under me: and my ankles shall not fail.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.38: I will pursue after my enemies, and crush them: and will not return again till I consume them.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.39: I will consume them and break them in pieces, so that they shall not rise: they shall fall under my feet.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.40: Thou hast girded me with strength to battle: thou hast made them that resisted me to bow under me.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.41: My enemies thou hast made to turn their back to me: them that hated me, and I shall destroy them.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.42: They shall cry, and there shall be none to save: to the Lord, and he shall not hear them.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.43: I shall beat them as small as the dust of the earth: I shall crush them and spread them abroad like the mire of the streets.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.44: Thou wilt save me from the contradictions of my people: thou wilt keep me to be the head of the Gentiles: the people which I know not, shall serve me,
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.45: The sons of the stranger will resist me, at the hearing of the ear they will obey me.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.46: The strangers are melted away, and shall be straitened in their distresses.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.47: The Lord liveth, and my God is blessed: and the strong God of my salvation shall be exalted:
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.48: God who giveth me revenge, and bringest down people under me,
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.49: Who bringest me forth from my enemies, and liftest me up from them that resist me: from the wicked man thou shalt deliver me.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.50: Therefore will I give thanks to thee. O Lord, among the Gentiles, and will sing to thy name.
2 Samuel or 2 Kings__22.51: Giving great salvation to his king, and shewing mercy to David his anointed, and to his seed for ever.
